featured.text: Stress is linked to the six __(36)__ causes of death— heart disease, cancer, lung disease, accidents, liver disease, and suicide.

definition.zh_def: 肝臟，一種位於腹部的器官，負責代謝、解毒和儲存營養。
definition.en_def: The liver is a large organ in the abdomen that processes nutrients, detoxifies harmful substances, and produces bile.
definition.example: The doctor said my liver function is normal.
